description: Sum of odd numbers between consecutive primes.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
example: a(4) = 9 is the single odd number between 7 and 11.
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, q=prime(n + 1); p=prime(n); a=(q + p)*(q - p - 2)/4; if (n==1, a=0); write("b062047.txt", n, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 30 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 06 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org) and Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 07 2001
OFFSET changed from 0,4 to 1,4 by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 30 2009
